name: Magellan
description:
Use Q/E to turn your boat. "." to wait.

Your goal is to circumnavigate the globe.

Protip: Sailing at angles to the wind is faster than sailing in the direction of the wind

The 7drl version was released fully within the deadline

The 1 hour late version was compiled at 1 am on March 14, 2022, but is much more playable, and as such is recommended

Github: https://github.com/FlamingKetchup/Magellan

Made using Nim and illwill

Nim: https://nim-lang.org/

illwill: https://github.com/johnnovak/illwill
